summary: The diff shows changes to backend/main.mo, frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts, and frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx that address backend connectivity, error handling, and admin authentication. However, the mobile UI fix for the Approve button in UserListTable.tsx is missing, and testing requirements cannot be verified from code changes alone.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the UserListTable component in frontend/src/components/admin/UserListTable.tsx to ensure the 'Approve' button is clearly visible and easily clickable on mobile screens by positioning it directly below the username in the mobile card layout with adequate touch target size (minimum 44x44px).
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to frontend/src/components/admin/UserListTable.tsx are present in the diff, yet this file is explicitly mentioned in the requirement as needing updates for mobile UI button placement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Test the complete admin panel workflow on mobile and desktop to ensure: admin can log in with credentials 'admin'/'habibur123', the user list loads immediately without errors, all user data is displayed correctly, and the Approve button works on both mobile and desktop without UI issues.
missing_requirements.reason: Testing requirements cannot be verified from code changes alone. No test files, test results, or documentation of testing workflows are included in the diff.
